EmailTemplate.name: System_Internal_DS Presents_Kaiser_9AM.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: The DS Presents: Kaiser Hackathon Deep-Dive webinar starts in 15 minutes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
See you soon!
DS Presents: Kaiser Hackathon Deep-Dive
A friendly reminder of your registration.
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Our internal DS Presents webinar begins in 15 minutes. This series is exclusive to Pivotal employees and we request that you keep details supplied in this email confidential. An on-demand replay will be posted to the Pivotal Data Science team Socialcast channel post live session.
Event Details:
Date: Wednesday, September 25, 2013
Time: 9AM PST/ 5PM GMT Summer Time
Join the Webex <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=668782781>
Event Number: 668 782 781
Dial In:
- US TOLL FREE: +1-855-749-4750 - US TOLL: +1-415-655-0001 - Global call-in numbers <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/globalcallin.php?serviceType=EC&ED=107432872&tollFree=1> - Toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf> - Access code: 668 782 781
Have questions? Contact us <mailto:ajimenez@gopivotal.com>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
Follow Us: Twitter <http://www.twitter.com/gopivotal> | LinkedIn <http://www.linkedin.com/company/gopivotal> | Facebook <http://www.facebook.com/gopivotal> | Google+ <https://plus.google.com/105320112436428794490>
